english.segment1: Your love is extravagent. Your friendship intimate. I find I'm moving. To the rhythms of Your grace. Your fragrance is intoxicating. In our secret place. Your love is extravagant
english.segment2: Spread wide in the arms of Christ. Is the love that covers sin. No greater love have I ever known. You considered me a friend. Capture my heart again. Capture my heart again
english.segment3: Deeper than the deepest ocean. Your love is. Higher than the highest mountain. Reaches higher than the Heavens. Still it finds its way to me. Finds its way to me
english.segment4: Your love is extravagant. Your love is extravagant. Your love is extravagant
